name: Imagination Funtime Odyssey: Test Demo 0.0.2
description:
An improved version of my previous demo. (This was left separate from the other project as that one was submitted through a game jam and I didn't want to interfere it until further notice.) I will be updating the test demo under this project for now.

Feel free to explore about as Oscar or as his friend Elizabeth  and an updated map to run around in, a new partner select screen, and a few other fixes and changes such as updated run and walk animations for Oscar and an improved long jump, plus more updates coming soon.

Arrow Keys: Move, Jump, Double Jump

X: Kick  (+ Mid-air: Slam)

C: Run (+ "X" Key: Boomerang Throw)

V: Long Jump (+ Mid-air: Dive) - (+ Ground Boomerang Throw: Spin Jump)
